Alleged car thieves lead police on chase through Hamilton, residents on edge after series of crimes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/alleged-car-thieves-lead-police-on-chase-through-hamilton-residents-on-edge-after-series-of-crimes/GIK6B4UUVZGGNO3OZHTETH7VDA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/alleged-car-thieves-lead-police-on-chase-through-hamilton-residents-on-edge-after-series-of-crimes/GIK6B4UUVZGGNO3OZHTETH7VDA/ A resident says police gave chase, and arrested four youths. Queensland rescue: Couple stranded in 40C heat stalked by croc after 4WD lost in flood waters https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queensland-rescue- Couple-stranded-in-40c-heat-stalked-by-croc-after-4wd-lost-in-flood-waters/AWYMRJVEERCORBCQXULQ2XGM4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queensland-rescue- Couple-stranded-in-40c-heat-stalked-by-croc-after-4wd-lost-in-flood-waters/AWYMRJVEERCORBCQXULQ2XGM4Q/ Raphael FranksThe couple wrote two large 'SOS' signs in the dirt, leading rescuers to their location. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 02:38:53 +0000 An 'SOS' sign a couple wrote in the dirt in the Gulf Country in North West Queensland, Australia, after getting stranded when their 4WD was swept away by flood waters. Photo / LifeFlight

Greens claim they can accelerate emissions cuts five-fold and improve the economy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/greens-claim-they-can-accelerate-emissions-cuts- Five-fold-and-improve-the-economy/WCI5J7WWF5GTXNFMOIS6OKT3JE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/greens-claim-they-can-accelerate-emissions-cuts- Five-fold-and-improve-the-economy/WCI5J7WWF5GTXNFMOIS6OKT3JE/ Green Party plan to cut net emissions by 35% by 2030, five times more than Government. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 02:12:54 +0000 New Zealand has committed to reducing its carbon emissions to half its 2005 levels by 2030 under the Paris Agreement, but there is fierce division about how to get there - or if it can be done. Photo / 123rf
Tasman couple in property maintenance dispute at luxury estate to pay almost $6k in overdue levies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tasman- Couple-in-property-maintenance-dispute-at-luxury-estate-to-pay-almost-6k-in-overdue-levies/5X7ICMEFJNAGZLUBYDGWVXZIHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tasman- Couple-in-property-maintenance-dispute-at-luxury-estate-to-pay-almost-6k-in-overdue-levies/5X7ICMEFJNAGZLUBYDGWVXZIHM/ Tracy NealThe judge likened it to not paying rates because the potholes had not been fixed. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The Mahana Ridge Subdivision in the Moutere Hills, Tasman District. The Development has been touted as “an exclusive country estate where luxury and rural living meet”.
